name: Bespilow Cervical Neck Pillow for Pain Relief - Small Cylinder Neck Roll & Round Bolster Contour Pillow, Portable Memory Foam Traction Device for TMJ,Hump Correction,Travel & Sleeping Support,Odorless
short_description: Fabric1：54% Nylon 37.4% Polyester 8.6% Spandex Fabric12：88% Nylon 12% Spandex

✅[FSA & HSA Eligible items，Relief neck pain in just 10 minutes]Our cervical spine curve design matches the cervical spine, offering vertical, horizontal support, and curvature stretch for neck traction. This positions the head to reduce spinal pressure, support the cervical spine, and help the C-shaped curve of the neck.

DUAL-DENSITY MEMORY FOAM TECHNOLOGY We engineered the core using two distinct types of memory foam. The base is crafted from Extra-Firm High-Density Memory Foam to deliver the powerful upward thrust required for spinal traction. The top layer consists of Cloud-Soft Low-Rebound Memory Foam that adapts instantly to your facial contours. This creates a structure that is sturdy enough to stretch your neck but soft enough to prevent jaw pressure.

🛡️ ERGONOMIC CERVICAL NECK PILLOW While many look for a neck pillow for sleeping, true relief requires correct alignment, not just softness. This acts as a specialized orthopedic support to act as a fulcrum for your neck's natural curve. It outperforms standard flat pillows by providing the necessary traction to relieve regular stiffness and pressure from poor daily posture or "Tech Neck."

❄️ CERTIFIED COOLING & SAFETY MATERIALS Your skin deserves the best. Our core is made of premium memory foam Certified by CertiPUR-US, ensuring it is odorless and free from harmful chemicals. The cover features an OEKO-TEX Standard 100 certified cooling fabric that is breathable, sweat-wicking, and fully removable for washing.

✈️ SMALL, COMPACT & TRAVEL-READY Big relief in a small package. This portable neck traction device is lightweight and fits easily into carry-ons or car seats. Whether on a business trip, a long road drive, or napping during a lunch break, it serves as your "on-the-go chiropractor." Perfect as a travel neck roll for instant decompression anywhere.

🔄 PRECISE CYLINDER NECK ROLL DESIGN Unlike shapeless toys, our engineered round cylinder bolster maintains its shape under pressure. The scientific C-curve works as a firm hump corrector, gently guiding the head back to fix forward head posture and smooth out dowager's humps. It provides the structural integrity that regular soft pillows lack.

⏱️ 10-MINUTE DAILY RESTORATION Use this neck stretcher for 10-30 minutes daily on the floor, yoga mat, or firm mattress. The gravity-assisted stretch helps reset your spine after a long day. Note: Designed for physical stretch therapy sessions; please do not use as an innovative pillow for all-night sleeping.
[Quality Services]Our Bespilow product has a 1-year satisfaction service policy. If you're not satisfied after 1 month of use, please contact our customer service.

name: Cabeau Airplane Travel Pillow for Long Flights - Evolution S3 - Supportive Memory Foam with Seat Straps to Secure Your Head and Neck and Provides 360° Support (Jet Black)
short_description: FROM THE MAKERS OF THE BEST TRAVEL PILLOW FIVE YEARS RUNNING - As featured in CNN, Travel + Leisure, People Magazine and more. Our memory foam travel pillow is the ideal car pillow for road trips or the perfect airplane neck pillow to catch some sleep on a long flight. Top off your travel kit with this premium support pillow to help avoid neck pain.

EXCLUSIVE PATENTED SEAT STRAPS - Attach our neck pillow for travel to ANY chair, including airplane seats or office chairs to prevent slouching or falling forward, keeping head and spine in perfect alignment for ultimate comfort and support.

HOW TO STRAP TO SEAT: Unhook straps from the pillow and pull them fully out of the buckles. Then, pull straps up and around the post connecting the headrest to the seat. Attach the strap ends to each other using the hook and loop tape tabs. If there isn’t a headrest with posts, simply wrap the pillow straps around the width of the seat and attach the end of the straps together in a large circle behind the seat back.

ERGONOMIC MEMORY FOAM DESIGN: Unlike other neck pillows for travel or gaming, our dual-density memory foam pillow provides comfort whether your head leans forward or to the side, featuring a custom-adjustable clasp for chin support.

PACKAGE INCLUDES: The Evolution S3 comes with a washable pillow cover, as well as a carry bag that allows the pillow to compress down to a third its size. Quick-release clasp attaches case to your luggage, saving critical packing space.

name: BCOZZY Travel Neck Pillow for Airplane – Patented Double Support for Head, Neck, and Chin. Best for Long Flights, Plane Sleeping, and Car Rides. Adjustable Size. Fully Washable. Carry Bag. Large, Navy
short_description: DOUBLE SUPPORT TO THE HEAD, NECK, AND CHIN - The Patented BCOZZY pillow is the only pillow that provides doubled support which helps relax and prevent neck pain and sore shoulders when sleeping sitting upright in an airplane, car, or at home. Available in two sizes for adults, the Large size for neck size up to 16”, and X-Large size for neck size 16” and above, the BCOZZY travel pillow is one of the most favorite travel accessories and travel gifts.

3 ERGONOMIC WAYS WITH DOUBLE SUPPORT – You can adjust the BCOZZY ergonomic pillow to your desired sleeping position and get maximum comfort. FRONT- Place the overlapping pillow arms under the chin for double chin support. SIDE - If you are a side-sleeper, fold the pillow in half, place it on the shoulder, and lean your head to the side. FRONT+ SIDE - If your head falls to the front and the side, slide the overlapping arms 90 degrees to the side and get double support to the neck and chin.

PERFECT BALANCE BETWEEN SOFTNESS AND FIRMNESS - Breathable fabric shell, made of cozy microfleece and cool microsuede, and filled with soft BOUNCE BACK down alternative, provide adequate comfort for the neck and head and will shape to your favorite position.

IS YOUR HEAD BEING PUSHED FORWARD USING U-SHAPE TRAVEL PILLOWS? While most travel pillows are bulky in the back, pushing the head forward and causing neck pain and muscle strain, our neck pillow has a FLAT-BACK design that prevents the head from being pushed forward.

EASY TO CARRY AND KEEP CLEAN- The BCOZZY pillow is very lightweight and comes with a carry case to keep it clean. The snap loop in the back of the pillow makes it easy to clip it to your luggage or hang it in the car.

IS YOUR TRAVEL PILLOW FULLY MACHINE WASHABLE? Unlike memory foam travel pillows that are not machine washable, our travel pillow design makes life as easy as counting sheep! Just pop it in the washer and let it air dry.
